Megatron Revived:
 
"I'm taking you to my base.  We have to fly through a storm, so hang on.  We are almost off Honshu Island of Japan."

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Blacknightmare:

"It's moving??? a Earthquake????"thought sleepy the femme whose awoke 
scared in a place that she didnt' know"Where am I?"

OOC: description of the place? please


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
>
> megatron Revived:
>  
> A bit worried, he hurries out of the cave and heads off to his base 
again.  Though his speed is hindered, by his cargo, and a storm that 
currently raged over much of japan.
>
